home.title: Welcome to Our Website
home.description: This is a brief description of our site.

bento.title: Save as image
bento.content: Save you schedule as an image and share it on twitter.

bento.title: Custom design and branding
bento.content: Customize your schedule to suit your style, lore and audience. Make it your own with custom backgrounds, colors, fonts and more.

bento.title: Twitch connected
bento.content: Schedule is connected to your twitch account, as you update your twitch schedule, the schedule will be updated here.

bento.title: Boost Productivity
bento.content: No more messing around with bulky photo editing tools. Quickly create a schedule with a couple of clicks, and then export it as an image for sharing on social media.

about.title: About Us
about.content: We are a company dedicated to...

motivations.beast: to run wild, destroying and killing
motivations.breeder: to give birth to, or create, evil
motivations.collector: to steal specific sorts of things
motivations.destroyer: to bring about the end of the world
motivations.fenrir: to bring about a prophesied disaster
motivations.tempter: to tempt people into evil or self-destruction

thechosenone.title: The Chosen One
thechosenone.description: a once-ordinary person who discovered they have a special destiny, and who has been given the power to accomplish it. The Chosen is good in a fight, with some weird powers.
